means: 含糊地说出( slur的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Her speech was so slurred as to be almost incomprehensible.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的声音含糊不清，几乎让人听不明白。

sentence.Network_en: He repeatedly mispronounced words and slurred his speech.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一再读错单词，而且说话含含糊糊的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: You could tell from his slurred speech that he was drunk ., 从他那含糊不清的话语中你就知道他喝醉了.
The pianist slurred the most beautiful passage in the sonata ., 这位钢琴家连奏了这部奏鸣曲中最美妙的一节.
she slurred over the high cost of her plan ., 她避而不提她这一计画费用之巨.

list.abs: ...6位长官从床上拉到地上拖行，导致背部皮开肉绽，并被种族歧视字眼（Racial Slur）辱骂，其中是否涉及种族歧视。
new words ... made-to-order prescription drugs 定制处方药 slurred speech 口齿不清 dizziness 头晕.
slur... ... slurred accent 含糊的重音 slurred speech {n.}言语不清 The drunk man slurred his words. 那醉汉说话含糊不清。.
崩塌构造 slump structure模糊印刷，重影 slurred impression小圈 small circle

entry.tran: 毁谤;诋毁;侮辱性的言辞
entry.def: A slur is an insulting remark which could damage someone's reputation.

example.ex: This is yet another slur on the integrity of the Metropolitan Police.
example.tran: 这是对伦敦市警察局刚正廉明作风的又一次诽谤。

entry.tran: (由于醉酒、生病或困倦等)含糊不清地说，大着舌头说
entry.def: If someone slurs their speech or if their speech slurs, they do not pronounce each word clearly, because they are drunk, ill, or sleepy.

example.ex: He repeated himself and slurred his words more than usual...
example.tran: 他重复了一遍，说得更含糊了。

example.ex: The newscaster's speech began to slur...
example.tran: 新闻广播员的话音变得含糊不清起来。

means.word_mean: 1. spoken as if with a thick tongue;

auth_sentence.content: This is followed by clumsiness, confusion, unsteadiness and slow or slurred speech.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is followed by clumsiness, confusion, unsteadiness and slow or slurred speech.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: I suppose my 'aura' experience is slurred speech and loss of cognitive abilities.

auth_sentence.content: I'm sorry carelessly to have slurred a service composed overwhelmingly of honest individuals.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm sorry carelessly to have slurred a service composed overwhelmingly of honest individuals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm sorry carelessly to have slurred a service composed overwhelmingly of honest individuals.
